First things first - a very useful tool.
 
For me it would be useful to have a two pane layout with the existing main form as the left pane and the inspection form on the right.  Also à la Outlook, it would be good if new items could be appear at the top of the list.
 
Slightly more of an ask: it would be great if it were a Visual Studio 2010 extension.
 
Thanks
 
Crispin
